channel.title: Start processing memberships again
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Start processing memberships again" - Non-members are not allowed to edit any page anymore because of wikidot policies.

item.title: Re: Start processing memberships again
item.content:encoded: Gonna say at least one membership needs processing at the time of this post. Looks like I missed the email message and only now just found it. Whoops.

item.title: Start processing memberships again
item.content:encoded: Non-members are not allowed to edit any page anymore because of wikidot policies. Please start processing membership applications again.
